title: Communities
execute: 
  echo: false
---

```{r}
library(reactable)
```

```{r}
communities <- read.csv("communities.csv")
```

```{r}
reactable(
  communities,
  columns = list(
    Website = colDef(cell = function(value) {
    htmltools::tags$a(href = value, target = "_blank", value)
    })
  )
)
```
